Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Goblet
Description: Coarsely manufactured goblet with a rounded conical base, slightly restricted mouth and simple lip. The surface is brick-red and bears numerous patches varying from light brown to dark grey in colour. The uneven exterior has been simply polished. The opening of the mouth is asymmetrical and the top surface of the lip is ondulating.
